titles: Inter Robertum Williamson, quer' et Mr. Attorney General, deft. Upon a writ of error in Parliament The case of the plaintiff, one of the assigns of Sir Robert Vyner. For 60 l. per annum, and the arrears thereof, out of the hereditary revenue of excise.
author: Dodd, Sam.
Williamson, Robert, one of the assigns of Sir R. Vyner.
Viner, Robert, Sir, 1631-1688.
notes: Imprint from Wing, which has publication date = [1699/1700].
Reproduction of the original in the University of London.
keywords: Debts, Public --  England --  Early works to 1800.
